copy.genericerror: There was an error processing your request. Please try again later.

learnmore.span: Learn more about Magical Membership Cards on our FAQs page.

yourmagicalmembership.span: Your Magical Membership Card has been redeemed on the account [account name]. For the next 31 days your Fairies will enjoy a Membership in Pixie Hollow

whatcani.span: What can I do as a Member?

asamember.span: As a Member, you'll gain access to all of the Fairy fun in the Hollow. Hit the shops, tailor your own fashions to add to your wardrobe, embark on exciting Fairy quests, and more!

whathappenswhen.span: What happens when this Membership expires?

pleasenotethat.span: Please note that when your Membership expires on [expiration date] you will no longer have access to Member only features. You can always reactivate your Membership by visiting our Membership page.
